description: Supply of two trailer mounted, programable battery and solar powered portable traffic signal lights in Jasper National Park
full_summary:
# Portable Traffic Lights Tender

## Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Reference**: WS4354366667
* **Publication Date**: December 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: January 11, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates**: March 15, 2024 (both start and end dates expected)

## Tender Details

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Pre-Qualification Method**: Invitation to Bid
* **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating for Technical Merit and Price

## Tender Description

Parks Canada Agency requires the supply, delivery, and offloading (if necessary) of two trailer-mounted, programmable battery and solar-powered portable traffic signal lights in Jasper National Park. The Contractor must comply with all requirements listed in the mandatory technical criteria to be considered a compliant bidder. Operational procedures for installation, start-up, and commissioning must be provided to Parks Canada.

## Contracting Entity Information

* **Government of Canada Department**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## End User Entity Information

* **End-User Entity**: Parks Canada Agency (PC)
* **Address**: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 0B3, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Point of Contact**: Willy Zumbado Diaz
* **Email**: [willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: Not provided
* **Fax**: Not provided

## Additional Information

The tender can be accessed through Ariba Discovery at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18283905?extsite=MTgyODM5MDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

The tender deadline has been amended to January 11, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. Any bids submitted after the deadline will be non-responsive. 

Procurement category: Goods and services (procurement category code GD)

Procurement method: Competitive, open bidding
